com.apple.audio.toolbox
Class AUConnectionInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.apple.audio.toolbox.AUConnectionInfo
public class AUConnectionInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains information about a connection that exists in an AUGraph.

AUConnectionInfo

public AUConnectionInfo(AUGraph inOwnerGraph,
                        AUNode inSourceNode,

                        AUNode inDestNode,
                        int inDestInputNumber)
                 throws CAException
This will establish a connection on the given graph between the source node's output bus to the destination node's input bus.

CoreAudio::AUGraphConnectNodeInput

Parameters:
inOwnerGraph - the graph that the connection will be made on
inSourceNode - the source node
inSourceOutputNumber - the source node's output bus number
inDestNode - the destination node
inDestInputNumber - the destinations node's input bus numer
See Also:
AUGraph.update(boolean)
